title: How to Make a Banana Pumpkin Smoothie

steps.headline: Put ice in the blender first, then add the other ingredients on top.
Puree in the blender for at least one minute or until the mixture is about the same thickness as a thick milkshake.
Pour into a tall glass or cup.
Cover the glass or cup.
steps.description: Put it in the freezer until you're ready to eat it, or at least 7 minutes if you will eat it right away. It should be about the same consistency as ice cream.

steps.headline: Let stand at room temperature until it's almost the consistency of a thick shake.
It's recommended to eat it with a spoon to really enjoy the flavors.
Decorate it with a sprig of mint, dash of cinnamon powder, or even a small piece of banana if you wish, or use a fancy cup.
Save any leftovers.
steps.description: If you can't eat or drink it all at once just cover the glass or cup and put it in the freezer for later. If you wish to eat it later, remove it from the freezer and let it stand for approximately 7 minutes, or until it melts to the desired consistency.

text: Put ice in the blender first, then add the other ingredients on top.  Set the blender speed on "Puree".  Puree in the blender for at least one minute or until the mixture is about the same thickness as a thick milkshake.  Pour into a tall glass or cup.  Cover the glass or cup. Put it in the freezer until you're ready to eat it, or at least 7 minutes if you will eat it right away. It should be about the same consistency as ice cream. Let stand at room temperature until it's almost the consistency of a thick shake.  It's recommended to eat it with a spoon to really enjoy the flavors.  Decorate it with a sprig of mint, dash of cinnamon powder, or even a small piece of banana if you wish, or use a fancy cup. Remember that Presentation is everything! Save any leftovers. If you can't eat or drink it all at once just cover the glass or cup and put it in the freezer for later. If you wish to eat it later, remove it from the freezer and let it stand for approximately 7 minutes, or until it melts to the desired consistency.
